titleStmt.title: An address to the magistrates, clergy, and learned gentlemen of the city of Dublin Or, A rational and expeditious method of teaching the English, Latin and Greek tongues, discovered.
titleStmt.author: Aickin, Joseph.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Joseph Ray, and are to be sold at his shop in Skinner Row, over-against the Tholsel,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Your most devoted and humble servant, Joseph Aickin.
Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library, Dublin.
